content:
theorem ext ⦃α β : X ≅ Y⦄ (w : α.hom = β.hom) : α = β :=
  suffices α.inv = β.inv by grind [Iso]
  calc
    α.inv = α.inv ≫ β.hom ≫ β.inv   := by grind
    _     = β.inv                    := by grind
def Function.RightInverse (g : β → α) (f : α → β) : Prop :=
  LeftInverse f g
open Function
def homToEquiv (α : X ≅ Y) {Z : C}
